headline: Can FTNT Stock Recover From YTD Drop on AI Security Push? How to Play
summary: Fortinet stock declines 15.6% YTD despite AI expansion efforts. Strong SASE momentum and raised guidance suggest holding for recovery.

headline: Fortinet: The Price Must Come Down Further
summary: I rate Fortinet a Hold after a 22% share price drop following the earnings release, with a $72 price target and a recommendation to wait for a better entry.
